page.title: 19A View from High Hill
page.content: A collosal stone house with rich green ivy, spreading across the smooth stone. The rectory's old proud chimmneys stick up into the atmosphere. A white wooden doorway. A beautiful garden with minute flowers that twinkle in the suniight. , A white outline round the rectory s roof. A lush weeping willow with the branches in clusters. A glinting building of stain glass eyes that cannot see. A shining metal cross. A fluffy cloud of smoke ries from the houses that are alike. A green field set amongst allthe other sweeping fields. (cont.)
